title: Fixes quite a few bugs.
message:
Fixes quite a few bugs.

Fixes when the service would turn off and sometimes not close.

Fixes the TTS intent leaking.

Fixes the notification showing when the service was closed

Fixes the service not restarting when closed intermittently.

Also fixes material theme since obviously nothing below L uses material

title: Some more cleanup from the previous refactor
message:
Some more cleanup from the previous refactor

Adds a way to get the current artist and track from the service, which should then be built upon to fix the track display. Also fixes one or two formatting inconsistencies.

title: Some more cleanup from the big refactor
message:
Some more cleanup from the big refactor

Should fix the manual on/off switch and also adds a simple method to check if the service is running from the client side.

title: Many improvements and fixes.
message:
Many improvements and fixes.

Main fixes are that of fixing settings menu, adding service class to run in the background (should stop the app not working after a few hours) and a lot of small fixes relating to those.

Some functionality currently broken due to the change of the app structure, but the overall app now works a lot better.
